task1.recipient: Dr. Sarah Johnson, Citywide Medical Center
task1.subject: Request for Additional Medical Information for Applicant APP-2023-45871
task1.body:
Dear Dr. Johnson,

I hope this message finds you well. We are currently reviewing the life insurance application for Mr. James Rodriguez, reference number APP-2023-45871. As part of our underwriting process, we require additional information regarding his diagnosis of spinal stenosis (Code M47.26) as noted in his medical records.

According to our underwriting guidelines, we kindly request the following details:
1. Date of diagnosis
2. Specific diagnosis and affected area of the spine
3. Severity classification (mild, moderate, severe)
4. Treatment plan and current status
5. Impact on activities of daily living (ADL) and occupational duties
6. Prognosis from treating physician
7. Any surgical interventions (planned or completed)
8. Current pain management regimen
9. Results of any imaging studies (X-ray, MRI, CT scan)

Please provide this information by November 15, 2023, to ensure a timely review of the application.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
[Your Position]
[Your Contact Information]

task3.subject: Explanation of Life Insurance Rating for Michael Thompson
task3.body:
Dear Maria,

I am writing to explain the rating decision for Michael Thompson's life insurance application, reference number APP-2023-89123. Based on our underwriting guidelines, Mr. Thompson's application has been classified as Rated A.

This decision is guided by the following factors:
- Type 2 Diabetes diagnosed 6 years ago
- HbA1c level of 7.4%
- Elevated BMI of 31.2
- Blood pressure reading of 142/92

According to guideline UW-LI-5.3.27, applicants with a diagnosis between ages 40-50, an HbA1c between 7.0-7.5%, and one additional cardiovascular risk factor are classified as Rated A. This classification results in a 25% premium adjustment from the Standard rate.

The rating decision was made using Table 7.2 of our underwriting guidelines.

Please feel free to reach out if you have any questions or need further assistance.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
[Your Position]
[Your Contact Information]
